name: LEGO The Hobbit
overview: From the shire to the lonely mountain. Play Hobbits, Mankind, Wizards, Elves, and Dwarves, as 13 dwarves try to recaim their homeland from Smaug the dragon. But their not the only ones Orcs are coming to claim The Lonely Mountain for themselves.As they getting closer to the mountain Gandalf senses a ancient evil rising. Play the prequel of The Lord of the Rings.
